DESCRI

description: Non-Material Amendment of Planning Permission ref: 18/12217/FUL (Variation of condition 2 (plans) of planning permission 17/12378/FUL (Erection of new buildings of 4 to 16 storeys in height and part demolition, alterations and change of use of Former Post Office and Former Telephone Exchange listed buildings to provide retail/ cafe/ restaurant uses (A1-A5 use) and flexible floorspace to be used for either retail/caf√©/restaurant uses (A1-A5) or Office (B1), Office (B1) floorspace and community/leisure (D1/D2 use) and 320 residential units) including for alterations to the external elevations and internal layouts of the 16 storey tower and proposed building fronting Brook Street and Old Post Office public space and alterations to the public realm around these buildings. The application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement Addendum and updated Technical report Addendums) dated 07/08/2018. Amendments looking to supersede drawings to reflect the design change in the Piazza area with later revisions of the same titled drawings relating to Condition 12 (Landscape)
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that the S96A application for a non-material amendment to be granted.
